course.title: Learn JavaScript by Building 7 Games - Full Course
course.description: ,'In this tutorial course, you will learn JavaScript by coding 7 retro grid-based games. Learn by doing and have 7 great projects for your career portfolio by the end of the course. Each game is done with minimal styling for you to take and make your own.

course.title: JavaScript Tutorial: Build Flappy Bird and Doodle Jump
course.description: Improve your JavaScript skills by building two popular millennial games: Doodle Jump & Flappy Bird.

course.title: Microsoft Excel Tutorial for Beginners - Full Course
course.description: Lean how to use Microsoft Excel from the beginning by creating 6 real-world projects. Most of the content applies to Google Sheets as well.

course.title: Python Tutorial - Python for Beginners [Full Course]
course.description: Python tutorial - Python for beginners - Go from Zero to Hero with Python (includes machine learning & web development project).

course.title: Material UI Course
course.description: Hey gang & welcome to this Material UI tutorial for React. In this series we will be looking at what Material UI is & how to use it to create greate-looking React applications.

course.title: Python Machine Learning Course
course.description: This course is on machine learning with Python using Tensorflow

course.title: Web Development Course
course.description: This is an introductory course for anyone who is interested in web development and is new to programming

course.title: Professional Stock Trading Course Lesson 1 of 10 by Adam Khoo
course.description: If you want to learn how to trade stocks profitably, even if you are a complete beginner, The Professional Stock Trading Course by Adam Khoo is designed to give you all the tools and strategies to trade stocks confidently and profitably.
